body:
Comment 3 by **gauge2**: 
right so as chomp on freenode irc pointed out, if you add 

//sys	Flock(fd int, how int) (errno int)

to syscall_linux.go and run the command to make the syscall file

./mksyscall.pl syscall_linux.go syscall_linux_amd64.go > zsyscall_linux_amd64.go

^for amd64, the new zsyscall_linux_amd64.go is generated.  After that rebuilding go
should resolve the issue (the correct way)

Is this at least more correct?  Sorry I'm still learning go.  Also all credit for the
real fix goes to chomp on freenode.
